thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Artem Gordon
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by Artem Gordon

author: Artem Gordon
title: Artem Gordon
text: I purchased only one product from this company. However, this was the only website that sold my product without any undesired added ingredients. The price was very fair, the shipping was standard, and overall the review would be a 4/5 but because this is the ONLY place where I was able to purchase what I wanted, I have to add another star. 5/5
